# transactionAuthor

**Instance Property**

A string that identifies the author of the transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
var transactionAuthor: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Specify a string to identify a transaction author when you save changes. Then, when you configure a [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNChangeHistoryFetchRequest], provide the same string in [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNChangeHistoryFetchRequest/excludedTransactionAuthors] to prevent fetching changes that the author already knows about.

## Configuring the save request

- **shouldRefetchContacts**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to refetch the added and updated contacts after the save request executes.
